availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Powell (Simpson Co. KY, farmer.)

body.p: Smith County, Tennesse and Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah Powell. Father of Priscilla D. Powell, John E. Powell, Rufus U. Powell, Edmund W. Powell, Charlotte Powell, and William Powell. Farmer in Smith County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Smith County, North of Cumberland and East of Caney Fork Rivers, p. 257A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 115.
Find A Grave, "James Powell (1803-1874)," Memorial #47450317, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47450317 (accessed September 14, 2020).
